attributes.action: Ask WDC and SCC to open the new road link in South Lowestoft
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Waveney District Council and Suffolk County Council have been debateing about wether a new road that link's Clifton rd car park to Horn Hill in South Lowestoft should open. 

   Beacuse Suffolk County Council own the land however, the road link has alreadey been built but is closed of. 

   With Kirkley Shopping area needing more trade to help buissness in Lowestoft. There needs to be better access to clifton rd car park.
